page.title: 06 Homelife
page.content: The menu for a child of school age will be selected from the following items. {BREAKFAST}Fresh fruit juices,cereals, toast,eggs,bacon,beans on toast, crumpets and a drink. {LUNCH}School days either a school meal or sandwiches,crisps and fruit with a drink.{ {TEA}A drink and biscuits,cake or crisps. {DINNER (evening meal)}Liver,sausages, (fried)lamb,beef,pork or chicken (roasted).These are eaten with a selection of vegetables.The most common being potatoes(boiled,roasted or fried as chips)peas,cabbage, cauliflower,carrots,mushrooms or swede.The drinks which are taken are selected from this list.Water,coffee, tea,hot chocolate,milk and soft drinks .Soft drinks are fruit flavoured.
